claim.body:
comprising: (A) a polybenzoxazole precursor including a repeating unit represented by the following Chemical Formula 1; (B) a photosensitive diazoquinone compound; (C) a silane compound; (D) a phenol compound; and (E) a solvent:
wherein, in the above Chemical Formula 1, X 1 and X 2 are the same or different and are independently an aromatic organic group or a tetravalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, Y 1 is an aromatic organic group or a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, and Z is
wherein: R 1 and R 2 are the same or different and are each independently C1 to C6 alkylene, and R 3 is C1 to C6 alkyl.

claim-text.claim-text: wherein, in the above Chemical Formula 1,
X 1 and X 2 are the same or different and are independently an aromatic organic group or a tetravalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group,
Y 1 is an aromatic organic group or a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, and
R 1 and R 2 are the same or different and are each independently C1 to C6 alkylene, and
R 3 is C1 to C6 alkyl.

claim.body:
the polybenzoxazole precursor further comprises a repeating unit represented by the following Chemical Formula 2, a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 3, or a combination thereof:
wherein, in the above Chemical Formulas 2 and 3, X 3 is an aromatic organic group or a tetravalent to hexavelent aliphatic organic group, X 4 is an aromatic organic group, a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, or a divalent to hexavalent alicyclic organic group, and Y 2 is the same or different and are independently an aromatic organic group or a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group.
claim.claim-text: 2. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the polybenzoxazole precursor further comprises a repeating unit represented by the following Chemical Formula 2, a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 3, or a combination thereof:

claim-text.claim-text: wherein, in the above Chemical Formulas 2 and 3,
X 3 is an aromatic organic group or a tetravalent to hexavelent aliphatic organic group,
X 4 is an aromatic organic group, a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, or a divalent to hexavalent alicyclic organic group, and
Y 2 is the same or different and are independently an aromatic organic group or a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group.

claim.body: the polybenzoxazole precursor comprises a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 1 and a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 2, a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 3, or a combination thereof at a mole ratio of m:n, wherein m+n=100 mol %, m ranges from about 5 to about 100 mol %, and n ranges from about 0 to about 95 mol %.
claim.claim-text: 3. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 2 , wherein the polybenzoxazole precursor comprises a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 1 and a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 2, a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 3, or a combination thereof at a mole ratio of m:n, wherein m+n=100 mol %, m ranges from about 5 to about 100 mol %, and n ranges from about 0 to about 95 mol %.

claim.body: the polybenzoxazole precursor, m ranges from about 5 to about 75 mol %, and n ranges from about 25 to about 95 mol %.
claim.claim-text: 4. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 3 , wherein in the polybenzoxazole precursor, m ranges from about 5 to about 75 mol %, and n ranges from about 25 to about 95 mol %.

claim.body: the polybenzoxazole precursor has a weight average molecular weight (Mw) of about 3,000 to about 300,000.
claim.claim-text: 5. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the polybenzoxazole precursor has a weight average molecular weight (Mw) of about 3,000 to about 300,000.

claim.body: the repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 1 of the polybenzoxazole precursor is derived from a diamine compound represented by the following Chemical Formula 4:
claim.claim-text: 6. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 1 of the polybenzoxazole precursor is derived from a diamine compound represented by the following Chemical Formula 4:

claim.body: the solvent comprises N-methyl-2-pyrrolidone, γ-butyrolactone, N,N-dimethyl acetamide, dimethylsulfoxide, diethyleneglycoldimethylether, diethylene glycoldiethylether, diethyleneglycoldibutylether, propyleneglycolmonomethylether, dipropyleneglycolmonomethylether, propyleneglycolmonomethyletheracetate, methyl lactate, ethyl lactate, butyl lactate, methyl-1,3-butyleneglycolacetate, 1,3-butyleneglycol-3-monomethylether, methyl pyruvate, ethyl pyruvate, methyl-3-methoxy propionate, or a combination thereof.
claim.claim-text: 7. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the solvent comprises N-methyl-2-pyrrolidone, γ-butyrolactone, N,N-dimethyl acetamide, dimethylsulfoxide, diethyleneglycoldimethylether, diethylene glycoldiethylether, diethyleneglycoldibutylether, propyleneglycolmonomethylether, dipropyleneglycolmonomethylether, propyleneglycolmonomethyletheracetate, methyl lactate, ethyl lactate, butyl lactate, methyl-1,3-butyleneglycolacetate, 1,3-butyleneglycol-3-monomethylether, methyl pyruvate, ethyl pyruvate, methyl-3-methoxy propionate, or a combination thereof.

claim.body: the resin composition comprises about 5 to about 100 parts by weight of the photosensitive diazoquinone compound (B), about 0.1 to about 30 parts by weight of the silane compound (C), about 1 to about 30 parts by weight of the phenol compound (D), and about 100 to about 400 parts by weight of solvent (E), wherein the amounts of (B), (C), (D), and (E) are based on about 100 parts by weight of the polybenzoxazole precursor (A).
claim.claim-text: 8. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the resin composition comprises about 5 to about 100 parts by weight of the photosensitive diazoquinone compound (B), about 0.1 to about 30 parts by weight of the silane compound (C), about 1 to about 30 parts by weight of the phenol compound (D), and about 100 to about 400 parts by weight of solvent (E), wherein the amounts of (B), (C), (D), and (E) are based on about 100 parts by weight of the polybenzoxazole precursor (A).

claim.body:
1. A positive photosensitive resin composition, comprising: (A) a polybenzoxazole precursor including a repeating unit represented by the following Chemical Formula 1; (B) a photosensitive diazoquinone compound; (C) a silane compound; (D) a phenol compound; and (E) a solvent:
wherein, in the above Chemical Formula 1, X 1 and X 2 are the same or different and are independently an aromatic organic group or a tetravalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, Y 1 is an aromatic organic group or a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, and Z is
wherein: R 1 and R 2 are the same or different and are each independently C1 to C6 alkylene, and R 3 is C1 to C6 alkyl.
2. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the polybenzoxazole precursor further comprises a repeating unit represented by the following Chemical Formula 2, a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 3, or a combination thereof:
wherein, in the above Chemical Formulas 2 and 3, X 3 is an aromatic organic group or a tetravalent to hexavelent aliphatic organic group, X 4 is an aromatic organic group, a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, or a divalent to hexavalent alicyclic organic group, and Y 2 is the same or different and are independently an aromatic organic group or a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group.
3. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 2 , wherein the polybenzoxazole precursor comprises a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 1 and a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 2, a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 3, or a combination thereof at a mole ratio of m:n, wherein m+n=100 mol %, m ranges from about 5 to about 100 mol %, and n ranges from about 0 to about 95 mol %.
4. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 3 , wherein in the polybenzoxazole precursor, m ranges from about 5 to about 75 mol %, and n ranges from about 25 to about 95 mol %.
5. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the polybenzoxazole precursor has a weight average molecular weight (Mw) of about 3,000 to about 300,000.
6. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 1 of the polybenzoxazole precursor is derived from a diamine compound represented by the following Chemical Formula 4:
7. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the solvent comprises N-methyl-2-pyrrolidone, γ-butyrolactone, N,N-dimethyl acetamide, dimethylsulfoxide, diethyleneglycoldimethylether, diethylene glycoldiethylether, diethyleneglycoldibutylether, propyleneglycolmonomethylether, dipropyleneglycolmonomethylether, propyleneglycolmonomethyletheracetate, methyl lactate, ethyl lactate, butyl lactate, methyl-1,3-butyleneglycolacetate, 1,3-butyleneglycol-3-monomethylether, methyl pyruvate, ethyl pyruvate, methyl-3-methoxy propionate, or a combination thereof.
8. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the resin composition comprises about 5 to about 100 parts by weight of the photosensitive diazoquinone compound (B), about 0.1 to about 30 parts by weight of the silane compound (C), about 1 to about 30 parts by weight of the phenol compound (D), and about 100 to about 400 parts by weight of solvent (E), wherein the amounts of (B), (C), (D), and (E) are based on about 100 parts by weight of the polybenzoxazole precursor (A).
9. A photosensitive resin film made using the positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 .
claim.claim_preamble: A photosensitive resin filmthe positive photosensitive resin composition
claim.claim-text: 9. A photosensitive resin film made using the positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 .

claim.body:
1. A positive photosensitive resin composition, comprising: (A) a polybenzoxazole precursor including a repeating unit represented by the following Chemical Formula 1; (B) a photosensitive diazoquinone compound; (C) a silane compound; (D) a phenol compound; and (E) a solvent:
wherein, in the above Chemical Formula 1, X 1 and X 2 are the same or different and are independently an aromatic organic group or a tetravalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, Y 1 is an aromatic organic group or a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, and Z is
wherein: R 1 and R 2 are the same or different and are each independently C1 to C6 alkylene, and R 3 is C1 to C6 alkyl.
2. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the polybenzoxazole precursor further comprises a repeating unit represented by the following Chemical Formula 2, a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 3, or a combination thereof:
wherein, in the above Chemical Formulas 2 and 3, X 3 is an aromatic organic group or a tetravalent to hexavelent aliphatic organic group, X 4 is an aromatic organic group, a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group, or a divalent to hexavalent alicyclic organic group, and Y 2 is the same or different and are independently an aromatic organic group or a divalent to hexavalent aliphatic organic group.
3. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 2 , wherein the polybenzoxazole precursor comprises a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 1 and a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 2, a repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 3, or a combination thereof at a mole ratio of m:n, wherein m+n=100 mol %, m ranges from about 5 to about 100 mol %, and n ranges from about 0 to about 95 mol %.
4. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 3 , wherein in the polybenzoxazole precursor, m ranges from about 5 to about 75 mol %, and n ranges from about 25 to about 95 mol %.
5. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the polybenzoxazole precursor has a weight average molecular weight (Mw) of about 3,000 to about 300,000.
6. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the repeating unit represented by Chemical Formula 1 of the polybenzoxazole precursor is derived from a diamine compound represented by the following Chemical Formula 4:
7. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the solvent comprises N-methyl-2-pyrrolidone, γ-butyrolactone, N,N-dimethyl acetamide, dimethylsulfoxide, diethyleneglycoldimethylether, diethylene glycoldiethylether, diethyleneglycoldibutylether, propyleneglycolmonomethylether, dipropyleneglycolmonomethylether, propyleneglycolmonomethyletheracetate, methyl lactate, ethyl lactate, butyl lactate, methyl-1,3-butyleneglycolacetate, 1,3-butyleneglycol-3-monomethylether, methyl pyruvate, ethyl pyruvate, methyl-3-methoxy propionate, or a combination thereof.
8. The positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 , wherein the resin composition comprises about 5 to about 100 parts by weight of the photosensitive diazoquinone compound (B), about 0.1 to about 30 parts by weight of the silane compound (C), about 1 to about 30 parts by weight of the phenol compound (D), and about 100 to about 400 parts by weight of solvent (E), wherein the amounts of (B), (C), (D), and (E) are based on about 100 parts by weight of the polybenzoxazole precursor (A).
9. A photosensitive resin film made using the positive photosensitive resin composition of claim 1 .
10. A semiconductor device including the photosensitive resin film of claim 9 .
claim.claim_preamble: A semiconductor devicethe photosensitive resin film
claim.claim-text: 10. A semiconductor device including the photosensitive resin film of claim 9 .
